project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project comprises SRC's investment requirements during the first three years (1977/78 - 1979/80) of the Government's Six-Year Development Plan. It includes the establishment of new diesel locomotive and wagon workshops, sleeper renewal over 500 km of track, rail renewal over 344 km, completion of the rail communications network, purchase of 10 replacement diesel locomotives and 400 wagons, purchase of locomotive spare parts, completion of the Atbara railway training school, and technical assistance in workshop design and organization. It is designed to enable SRC to carry the anticipated traffic up to about 1980/81.
